datasets.common module¶

class datasets.common.Dataset(dataset_path, encoding)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that represents a dataset.

apply_function_to_files(func: Callable)[source]¶

Applies the given function to each of the text files in the corpus.

Parameters

func – The function to be applied to each text file.

as_dataframe() → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶

Returns the files as a pandas DataFrame.

as_documents_content_list(tokenize_words=True)[source]¶

Returns a list of the content of the documents in the dataset.

Parameters

tokenize_words – If true, each document content is converted into a list of words.

Returns

List of the content of the documents in the dataset.

as_documents_obj_list(tokenize_words=True) → List[datasets.common.Document][source]¶

Returns a list of Document objects of the documents in the dataset.

Parameters

tokenize_words – If true, each document content is converted into a list of words.

Returns

List of Document objects of the documents in the dataset.

get_original_doc_content_from_disk(doc: datasets.common.Document) → str[source]¶

Given a Document object, this method return it’s content obtained from disk as a str.

Parameters

doc – Document.

Returns

Content of the given document obtained from disk.

class datasets.common.Document(name: str, content: str = None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that represents a dataset document. Stores the info needed to access that doc in the dataset directory and the document content.

get_doc_path_inside_dataset_folder() → str[source]¶

Returns the relative path of the document inside the dataset directory.

datasets.common.get_file_content(file_path: str, encoding: str = None) → str[source]¶

Returns the content os the specified file as a string.

Parameters

  • file_path – Path of the file to be converted into a string.

  • encoding – Encoding of the file.

Returns

The content of the file as a string.
